{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3322750,"name":"","username":"noamrose","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/noamrose/{size}/264006_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-03T21:18:10.483Z","cooked":"

Hello!
we have a probklem when we ran our autononous routine, our robot is driving very strangly (image attached) and rotating (not anything like the path that we are giving him.). we have got logs of the movement. any suggestions?
thank you in advance

(the path that he tried to do is moving 2 meters forward)

the solution for that was reading. we used the old convention for the coordinate system (for each alliance the origin changed) and not the new convention where no matter what alliance you are you use the blue origin. on top of that, we used the getChassisSpeeds incorrectly.
